author: donaldp
msg: Removed SarContextResources as it was not providing anything useful.
Cleaned up a few other places.

author: donaldp
msg: Rework Application and phases so that they are frame based instead of containing a multitude of individual facilities.
Rework Application logging so that *only* logging generated by Blocks goes to <app.home>/logs/* and all the logging generated by kernel or Application support code goes to phoenix wide logs.

author: donaldp
msg: Instead of having individual facilities for individual aspects (when they all really cooperate together), each Application will have a single "frame" in which to execute.

author: donaldp
msg: Update LogKit for new Hierarchy.setDefaultPriority() method

author: donaldp
msg: Reuse ExcepptionUtil rather than custom expansion of exceptions.
